parameters.name: App
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: \[1,100].

parameters.name: RulesId
parameters.description: The ID of the subtitle rule.

parameters.name: SuffixName
parameters.description:
The suffix of the subtitle rule.

> Set the value to the name of the subtitle template.
